mdRecord.dcterms:title: Richmond / Henrico County / Manchester / and / Springhill / Chesterfield Co / (Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: London; Note: image depicts front; see "Related Item" field for verso of image. Published in The Illustrated London News, p. 261, September 7, 1861, this map of Richmond features the Manchester and Springhill ares of the city south of the James River. It locates public buildings and the railway depot by number with a key at the upper right of the map. Also shown are Hollywood Cemetery and the Penitentiary. --From This New Founde Lande: The Henry & Kaye Spalding Map Collection at Hampden-Sydney College, 2008.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ettling, Theodor, 1823-
